subject: 4.7 nearly out, planning for 4.8
msgSnippet: All, JUnit 4.7RC1 is now available on GitHub: http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/downloads. The most significant new feature is rules (see the release notes for
messageBody:
All,

JUnit 4.7RC1 is now available on GitHub:
http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/downloads. The most significant new feature
is rules (see the release notes for details).

As we begin planning 4.8 we'd like to know more about how you use JUnit.
We've set up a Survey.io survey to gather your feedback:
http://survey.io/survey/ca4b2.

Regards,

Kent and David
